title: Productive Failure Learning Through Electronic Textile Design Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Electronic textile design tasks in a smartphone-based simulation environment, strengthening problem-solving skills through failure case analysis and debugging processes

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify three or more types of physical/software defects occurring in e-textile design processes.
They can diagnose causes of errors with over 80% accuracy by analyzing error messages in simulation tools.
Through peer feedback and debriefing sessions, learners derive at least two improvement strategies from their failure cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
